### Information about figures in this directory
### 2020/04/17

### Input file information
- input file: eta-05_05.csv
- 30k tracks
- pt > 1
- nhits > 10
- eta: [-0.25, 0.25]
- phi: [-0.25, 0.25]

### Results
- errors for X larger than those for Y and Z
- some x values (from x_0 to x_5) have negative values (strange!!!)
